metadata.title: Sir Mix A Lot - Baby Got Back
metadata.creator: Sir Mix A Lot

tracks.text: 2 white girls watch a black woman in a tight mini dress spin on a pedestal. The blond one talks while the brunette chews gum.
Sir Mix A Lot stands on a large orange sculpture of a butt.
A metal spring appears, stretching wide.
4 black women in tight clothes stand on a pedestal. In front of them, a bouncer stands in front of the stage.
Several men in Seahawks hoodies stand around, including one with a papparazzi camera. A photos appears of a black woman, wearing a tight mini dress that hug their round butts.
The men in the hoodies and the bouncer watch the women dance.
The 4 women stand in heels with their butts pushed back. They wave their hands near their butts while bouncing them.
The women mime spanking something in the air in front of them.
Facing away from us, the women vibrate their butts and raise their hands up.
A bony white woman poses on the cover of Cosmopygian, November 1991.
3 black men stand in front of a microphone and sing along with the song
Sir Mix A Lot stands on the butt statue and calls down to the men and bouncer below him.
Seen from above, the women stand in a circle and bend forward, making a circle of butts. They clap above their butts.
A DJ scratches a record, with a butt figurine in the center.
The women, bent forward, bounce their butts together and patt each other's butts.
5 peaches float in a circle, with the crack of the peaches facing us. The peaches bounce and vibrate.
Sir Mix A Lot walks forward, with women dancing while following him.
The women face away, run their hands over their butts, and then face back, all while walking towards us. The men in hoodies stand on the pedestal, watching intently.
White, thin plastic dolls stand in a row.

Sir Mix A Lot sings, his head next to a woman's butt. She moves her butt in a circle. She's in a row of other women, who do the same. At the end of the row, Sir Mix A Lot sings next to the last woman's butt.
A white woman wears a corset with a cone shaped bra, evocative of Madonna.
Sir Mix A Lot walks in front of letters that spell out his name.
A woman's mouth parts in a gasp. A banana spins in a circle.
Butt shaped bell peppers vibrate.
2 lemons press against each other.
Sir Mix A Lot stands on the ground, looking up at the women. They dance on top of the butt sculpture.
A white man in a suit watches intently and loosens his tie.
The women stand in a circle facing each other. From behind them, we see them bouncing their butts. Occasionally, words appear. Rump. Thick. Rear.
A butt shaped pear appears.
A black woman stands naked, covering herself with her hands and her long black hair. She stands in front of a 10 foot wide shell, evocative of the painting The Birth of Venus.
A woman in a red bra dances. Around her waist, she wears a circle of dangling bananas. The bananas along her curvaceous butt stand the tallest.
Sir Mix A Lot moves his hands like a snake, holding it in front of the crack of the butt sculpture behind him. He gestures to the women dancing on the giant butt.
The white Cosmo model mouths "You're fat."
Text appears. Dorsum.
Sir Mix A Lot uses his hands to draw in the air the outline of a curvaceous waist and butt
The Cosmo model looks offended. Three of the black women dance with their butts to us.
Sir Mix A Lot sits in the crack of the giant butt.
Rapid montage of butt shaped fruits and vegetables.
A black woman in pink fluffy lingerie lies on a leopard print blanke and holds a pink phone. Text appears. Call Now.
Sir Mix A Lot sits in the crack of the giant butt and mimes scratching a record. A woman bounces her butt to the rate of the record scratching.

The black woman in the mini dress from the beginning spins on the pedestal, emphasizing her butt. A plastic doll's bare, slender torso and waist jiggle. The woman poses, and her mini dress barely covers her butt.
Sir Mix A Lot crotch thrusts the crack of the giant butt.
Text appears. Much back.
The Cosmo model stands. A balloon in the back of her pants grows awkwardly.
A banana and a butt shaped tomato spin around each other.
